> The problem seems to be if you have no mages, archmages, soldiers, 
> ghosts, clerics, fairies, druids, elves or thieves. Thus it seems 
the 
> problem is not much of a problem at all. The reasonable choice, 
then, 
> would be to make elves' attacks weaker as they travel through 
> forests, which makes sense as trees do not generally stand aside for 
> rocks.

That's what I think.  For really low experience levels, this effect 
would almost unnoticeable.  But at very high experience levels, the 
effect would be noticeable.

Something like the attack loses a percentage of strength for every x 
amount of time it travels in a forest.
